title: Thlarau bote chhandam rawh
lyrics:
Thlarau bote chhandam rawh,
Vak bote ka zawng la;
Dawhthei takin anmahni,
Kawng zimah hruai lut rawh;
Ngilnei takin an hnenah,
Tlantu kohna hrilh rawh;
Ruai chu an peih ta, sawm rawh,
"Hmun a awm e," tiin.

Hmun a awm, hmun a awm,
Ruai chu an peih ta, sawm rawh,
"Hmun a awm e," tiin.

Lungngaihna kawr ata leh
Zan thim tak ata chu,
Ram nuam ni enna hmunah,
Remna thianghlim engah,
Isua hnenah rawn hruai rawh,
Thawvenna hmunah chuan;
Ruai chu an peih ta, sawm rawh,
"Hmun a awm e," tiin.

Rilru ngilnei tak puin,
Lalpa hmingin kal rawh;
Ngaihdamna famkim tak chu,
Khawvel hnenah hrilin;
Kaw en chhungin thawk langin,
Zan a lo thlen hmain;
Ruai chu an peih ta, sawm rawh,
"Hmun a awm e," tiin.
